name: message-get
title: Get Message Details
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific message including its content, metadata, and creation details. Use this to inspect individual messages, verify content, or get message details for debugging purposes.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the message (format: "thread_abc123...").

message_id.description: The unique identifier of the message to retrieve (format: "msg_abc123...").

examples.title: Get specific message
examples.description: Retrieve details about a particular message in a conversation
